author: freakstar50
post_text: June 12, 2015 at 4:12 PM#1i've got this macro for making a seq with just an dimmer and a shutter in a diffrent cuecan someone help me with making this macro run better and cleaner1. Group @2. Matricks 23. at 1004. store (page.exec)5. presetType beam at (shutter 0/100)6. store cue 2 @  ///// i want this to be at the same place as i stored the number 47. label @ ///// i want this to select it automaticly to the seq abovethan its all the same but than with matrick 3 Odd

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: June 12, 2015 at 7:23 PM#2try using $variablesCodeGroup @Matricks 2At 100SetUservar $myexec=(page.exec)Store Executor $myexecPresetType "beam" At (shutter 0/100)Store Executor $myexec cue 2Label Executor $myexec

title: Help with a macro
